start.0: Welcome to the Blades in the Dark's telegram Bot by : Niccoló Bergamaschi, Gabriele Brenna and Leandro Bognanni.
start.1: License {} : This work is based on Blades in the Dark (found at http://www.bladesinthedark.com/), product of One Seven Design, developed and authored by John Harper, and licensed for our use under the Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported license (http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/).
start.2:
Create a group chat with your friends and invite them all to 
/login.
 After the registration you can start playing.
 If you have any questions, pls use 
/help

greet_chat_members.0: Scoundrel {} was bragged to Doskvol by {}

default.0: 🔪HELP SECTION🔪 For more info about complex commands (marked with 🔎) type /help followed by the name of the command
default.1: -GENERAL- /start - welcome message with credits and bot's starting instruction /login - register your telegram account by choosing a username.
default.2: -CREATION- /createPC - start the creation of a PC. 🔎

commands.createpc: Starts the creation of a PC. The information required during this conversation are the PC's name, alias, background, heritage, class, vice and optionally a more detailed description. The new created character is stored in your personal data and you can join any game you want with him.

start_login.0: You are approaching Doskvol, to register: [🔐 CLICK HERE 🔐]

user_is_registered.0: You cannot use this command. Please /login

login.1:
You are already registered
Write your new username or /cancel

create_pc.0: {} is starting the creation of a PC in private chat
create_pc.1:
Complete the description of your PC by selecting the buttons below.
 /done when you are satisfied of your brand new scoundrel.
 /cancel if you have changed your mind.

create_pc_class.1:
Select an existing class.
/data for more info.

create_pc_name.0: ⚠ You already have a PC named <u>{}</u>, if you don't change name, it will be overwritten. ⚠

create_pc_state_switcher.1: What would you like to be called?
create_pc_state_switcher.3: What can you tell about your heritage?
create_pc_state_switcher.4: Let's talk more about yourself. What is your background?
create_pc_state_switcher.5: Describe the unique features of yours.
create_pc_state_switcher.7: The life of a criminal is stressful... you must have a vice to relief yourself.

create_pc_vice_description.0: How do you manage to obtain what you seek? Tell who your purveyor is or where you go to satisfy your needs.

create_pc_end.0: ⚠ Cannot save a partially described PC. Please fill all the fields.

create_game.0: Insert the name of the game

create_game_title.1: A Game named <u>{}</u> already exists in this chat, please enter a different title

join.0: Write the name of the game you want to join
join.1:
There are no games for this chat to join in...
/createGame to create a new one.

join_game_name.0:
Game <u>{}</u> does not exist...
You can create a new game with /createGame
join_game_name.1: Write the name of the PC you want to start playing with or 'as Master' to join as the GM of the game.
join_game_name.2: You already joined the game <u>{}</u> in this chat. You can join only a game per chat

join_complete_pc.0: {} is completing the creation of {} in private chat
join_complete_pc.1:
Complete your PC by selecting the buttons below.
 /done when you are satisfied.
 /cancel if you have changed your mind.

join_complete_pc_state_switcher.0: Write the name of your initial Special Ability.
join_complete_pc_state_switcher.1: You have 4 action dots to assign. The initial action dots of your class are already present (if you want you can change them too)
join_complete_pc_state_switcher.2: Doskvol is a dark place, but even here you will find some friends. Who is your ally?
join_complete_pc_state_switcher.3: You are not a saint, so a lot of people will struggle against you. Who is your rival?

join_complete_pc_ability.0: This special ability doesn't exist yet...
join_complete_pc_ability.1:
Select an existing ability.
/data for more info.

join_complete_pc_friend.0: This NPC doesn't belong to your strange friends pool...
join_complete_pc_friend.1:
Select another NPC.
/data for more info.

join_complete_pc_enemy.0: This NPC doesn't belong to your strange friends pool...
join_complete_pc_enemy.1:
Select another NPC.
/data for more info.

join_complete_pc_dots.0:
Add or remove the action dots of your choice.
{} points left.

join_end.1: You must complete all the fields in order to complete your pc and join the game

create_crew.0: Choose which Type of crew you'd like to be
create_crew.1: You can't create a crew without being in a game... /join to take part in a game

create_crew_type.0: This crew doesn't exist yet... Enter another one
create_crew_type.1:
Complete the description of your Crew by selecting the buttons below.
 /done when you all are satisfied.
 /cancel if you have changed your mind.

create_crew_state_switcher.0: Choose the name of your crew
create_crew_state_switcher.1: Decide a reputation for your crew
create_crew_state_switcher.2: Write the description of your crew, don't forget to specify your favourite hunting grounds
create_crew_state_switcher.3: Choose the location of your Lair
create_crew_state_switcher.4: Select a pair of upgrades for your crew
create_crew_state_switcher.5: Pick a special ability for your crew
create_crew_state_switcher.6: Select a contact for your crew

create_crew_lair_location.0: Write a description of your Lair

create_crew_ability.0: This special ability doesn't exist yet...
create_crew_ability.1:
Select an existing ability.
/data for more info.

create_crew_contact.0: This NPC doesn't belong to your crew contacts pool...
create_crew_contact.1:
Select another NPC.
/data for more info.

create_crew_upgrades.0:
Add or remove the upgrades of your choice.
{} points left.

create_crew_end.0: The crew <u>{}</u> added to the game.
create_crew_end.1: You must complete all the fields in order to complete your crew
